name: Guri (V)
Lore: 'Human-replica droid. Programmed to function as Xizor''s personal bodyguard and assassin. Black Sun agent. Cost 9 million credits. Worth every decicred.',
Text: 'Adds 2 to power of anything she pilots. At Coruscant sites where you have a Black Sun agent, your Force drains are +1. While with Xizor in battle, she may be forfeited to satisfy all remaining battle damage against you. Immune to Restraining Bolt, purchase, and attrition < 5.',
